small_telos.current: Enhance food database coverage for store brands by integrating with an additional public food database or implementing a user-contribution mechanism, aiming to reduce 'doesn't recognize store brands' complaints by 50%

last_proposal.title: New Small Telos: Enhance food database coverage for store brands

completed_tasks.objective: Improve barcode scanning reliability â€” implement UPC database fallback when OCR fails, reducing scan failure rate from 15% to under 5%
completed_tasks.details: Researched and selected UPCitemdb.com API. Implemented fallback logic in barcode_scanner_module.cjs: if OCR fails after 2 attempts, try barcode number lookup. Wrote comprehensive tests in barcode_scanner_module.test.cjs covering OCR success, OCR failure + barcode success, and complete failure paths. Updated integrations.json for future API key requirements.

notes: v3 autonomous-first protocol. Successfully submitted new small telos proposal for approval. Now awaiting human approval.
